item.title: How to Run Linux on Chromebooks with Crouton
item.description: In this video tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how you can run other Linuxes than Chrome OS on Chromebooks using a software called crouton.

item.title: Run Chrome OS and Linux simultaneously on the Chromebook Pixel
item.description: In this demo video Kevin Tofel of Gigaom shows how you can use Google's Chromebook Pixel with other Linux based operating systems than Chrome OS.

item.title: ZaReason Terra HD
item.description: The Terra HD is a thin and lightweight 11.6-inch netbook/subnotebook by Linux hardware builder ZaReason. It is powered by a 1.66 GHz Intel Atom N450 CPU.

item.title: Chitech CT-PC89E Running Debian GNU/Linux
item.description: The Chitech CT-PC89E is a low-cost ARM-based netbook from China powered by a 667MHz Samsung S3C6410 processor.

item.title: Lemote YeeLoong 8089
item.description: According to the Chinese computer company Lemote the YeeLoong 8089 is the world's 1st laptop that exclusively contains free software.

item.title: Hak5 on Unlocking Linux on the Zipit Z2
item.description: Hak5 Technolust is a tech show covering topics like network security, open source, and DIY modding. In episode 615, the 1st and certainly not the last I
